workExperience.description: Single-handedly designed and developed the entire front-end using Next JS, Typescript, and Tailwind CSS. Implemented a real-time AI Interview chat page with features such as audio recording and code writing. Developed a user-specific dashboard for three different user types. Worked closely with the CTO to plan and execute backend strategies.

Conducted comprehensive research on various communities and their content to inform product development. Initiated and hosted a ’Squid Tank India’ show to attract initial MVP testers. Led the development and launch of the MVP within a month.

projects.name: Operating System Simulator
projects.description: Developed a user-friendly interface that allows users to open and drag multiple folders. Integrated gaming functionality into the system. Designed a mobile-friendly UI/UX. Implemented a custom music player for enhanced user experience. Adopted a sci-fi inspired design for the UI/UX.

projects.name: System Design Puzzles, Node-based Editor
projects.description: Developed an interactive node-based editor, Puzzle Board. Integrated a feature for users to solve system design puzzles for preparation. Incorporated AI to provide suggestions and assistance to users. Added a brainstorming feature for users to create an empty board. Implemented a leaderboard to foster competition and boost user confidence.

projects.name: CommComm
projects.description: Developed CommComm, a community platform for students to build their own communities with free courses via YouTube Playlist. Utilized Next Js + Typescript for development, with Firebase as the backend. Managed states across 15+ pages using Redux toolkit. Implemented Youtube Playlist API for fetching course details. Enhanced user engagement by adding gamification features such as collecting coins and following level-like paths.
